title: Wayfinder devs apologize as server woes lead to a poor launch reception
description: The action MMO's early access launch has left it with mostly negative Steam reviews.

title: Baldur's Gate 3 is a great RPG, but also a victory for the immersive sim
description: Baldur's Gate 3 maxed out its "player expression" and "reactive sandbox" stats.

title: Another King of Dragon Pass successor, Six Ages 2, plunges its world into chaos
description: The cult-est of cult classic strategy series gets a third entry.

title: Rainbow Six Siege keeps reinventing itself in ways other games are too scared to try
description: Eight years on, Siege has never been better.

title: Today's Wordle hint and answer #792: Sunday, August 20
description: A hint to help you out and today's Wordle answer if you need it.

title: Twitch streamers can soon stop banned people from watching altogether
description: Right now, a ban just means you can't chat.
